content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No structures have been successfully built on the map. Multiple attempts were made to supply a Lab at position (0.5, 2.5) by either placing a new Lab or crafting one from available resources, but none resulted in a persistent structure. Although operations were performed with smelting devices—such as a furnace retrieved at Position(5.0, 5.0) for iron smelting and a copper furnace at Position(-27.0, -60.0) for copper processing—these units appear to be pre‐existing and were not constructed by the agent.

ERROR TIPS
• API Usage Errors with get_entities:
 – When calling get_entities, avoid using unsupported keyword arguments (e.g. passing radius=5) and ensure the number of positional parameters matches the function’s signature.
• Handling Null Returns:
 – Validate that functions like get_entities return a valid list before iterating over the result to prevent issues such as attempting to iterate over a NoneType.
• Lab Placement and Crafting Failures:
 – Confirm that a Lab is available in the inventory before trying to place it on the map.
 – Ensure all required sub-ingredients (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, copper-cables, copper-plates) are sufficiently produced and available prior to initiating Lab crafting.
• Resource Shortage Management:
 – Verify overall resource and sub-ingredient availability (including proper smelting operations) to prevent crafting failures due to missing prerequisites.
